project_descr: Economic growth is accelerated to reduce vulnerabilities and poverty, strengthen the resilience of the licit economy and reduce the illicit economy in its multiple dimensions

outputs.output_descr: Rural Energy Services increased in targeted areas; Economic growth is accelerated to reduce vulnerabilities and poverty, strengthen the resilience of the licit economy and reduce the illicit economy in its multiple dimensions.
Rural energy policy and regulations in place, Afghanistan Sustainable Energy for Rural Development (ASERD)
Innovative approaches to delivering rural energy piloted in target areas, Afghanistan Sustainable Energy for Rural Development (ASERD)
Capacity of rural communities and relevant institutions developed inclusive of a community outreach programme.
Afghanistan Sustainable Energy for Rural Development (ASERD) Project document finalized
